references.type: text of measure as reported in Senate

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 106-454.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 900.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct feasibility studies on water optimization in the Burnt River basin, Malheur River basin, Owyhee River basin, and Powder River basin, Oregon.
short_title: Burnt, Malheur, Owyhee, and Powder River Basin Water Optimization Feasibility Study Act of 2000

summary.text: Burnt, Malheur, Owyhee, and Powder River Basin Water Optimization Feasibility Study Act of 2000 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to conduct feasibility studies on water optimization in the Burnt River basin, Malheur River basin, Owyhee River basin, and Powder River basin, Oregon.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Burnt, Malheur, Owyhee, and Powder River Basin Water Optimization Feasibility Study Act of 2000
Burnt, Malheur, Owyhee, and Powder River Basin Water Optimization Feasibility Study Act of 2000
Burnt, Malheur, Owyhee, and Powder River Basin Water Optimization Feasibility Study Act of 2000

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a feasibility study on water optimization in the Burnt River basin, Malheur River basin, Owyhee River basin, and Powder River basin, Oregon.
